alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 18 at 2:17PM MST until February 19 at 10:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph, with gusts up to 75 mph, are expected. Isolated wind gusts approaching 85 mph are possible along the immediate eastern slopes of the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front, including all of Glacier County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 10 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts during the day on Saturday could lead to significant blowing and drifting of the falling and or fallen snow along and west of the United States Highway 89 corridor, especially west of Browning along United States Hwy 2
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
